column4: Note: I am installing BackTrack, but they both use same Debian-based installer, very very similar. Issue: It seems to be forzen on "Resizing partition..." in the prepare disk space step. Can this take a very very long time? Help.
Backtrack has their own support channel: #backtrack-linux, we do not support backtrack in #ubuntu
As we've said before we don't support backtrack here, even if that channel isn't busy.  Sorry.
You could also try asking in ##linux
1) mind your language, 2) aptitude does not handle multiarch properly, and should not really be used.
is that what is causing the issue? afaik I don't have the 32-bit libs installed
